name: Mindslaver

name: Auriok Replica
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice this creature: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to you this turn.
flavor_text: All the loyalty of the Auriok with only a trace of their self-righteousness.

name: Semblance Anvil
oracle_text:
Imprint — When this artifact enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: Forged from what it forges.

name: Barbed Battlegear
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +4/-1.
Equip {2}
flavor_text:
"One need only look at the inhabitants of this world to see that they are forged halfway to perfection. All they need is a whisper of the Glorious Word."
—Urabrask the Hidden

name: Sword of Body and Mind
Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"I am an artist, a builder, a creator . . . I create the biggest explosions around."
—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

name: Wing Puncture
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"If I were the air, I wouldn't taunt the ground. It has the weight advantage."
—Konnos, Sylvok sage

name: Ezuri's Brigade
oracle_text: Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, this creature gets +4/+4 and has trample.
flavor_text: Riding ravenous, ever-growing vorracs is almost as dangerous as fitting them with saddles.

name: Exsanguinate
oracle_text: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.

name: Riddlesmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

name: Glint Hawk Idol
oracle_text:
Whenever another artifact you control enters, you may have this artifact become a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
{W}: This artifact becomes a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

name: Darksteel Myr
oracle_text: Indestructible (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature. If its toughness is 0 or less, it still dies.)

name: Auriok Edgewright
oracle_text: Metalcraft — This creature has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: Auriok soldiers craft their own weapons, forging a connection to the steel with each blow of the hammer.

name: Flight Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
When this artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

oracle_text:
Imprint — When this artifact enters, you may exile an artifact card from your hand.
{X}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card. X is the mana value of that card.

oracle_text:
This artifact enters with three charge counters on it.
{R}{R}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
{2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from this artifact: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Argentum Armor
flavor_text: Mirrodin's creator still lives, still shapes metal, and still commands world-shaking power.

name: Myrsmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
flavor_text: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Most casualties of the power struggle between vedalken and Neurok didn't die on the field of battle; they merely disappeared.

name: Screeching Silcaw
oracle_text:
Flying
Metalcraft — Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, that player mills four cards.
flavor_text: It's adaptively deaf to its own cries.

name: Untamed Might
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Beasts kill for their very survival. If you would have their strength, you must know their desperation."
—Konnos, Sylvok sage

name: Revoke Existence
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."
—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

name: Palladium Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text: The myr are like the Glimmervoid: blank canvases on which to build grand creations.

name: Kemba, Kha Regent
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba.
flavor_text: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

name: Dross Hopper
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: This creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Bred in the vicious Mephidross, dross hoppers learned to eat quickly and escape faster.

name: Infiltration Lens
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked by a creature, you may draw two cards.
Equip {1}
flavor_text: Neurok spies carry devices that let them look a few moments into the future, giving them an almost insurmountable edge.

oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

name: Rust Tick
oracle_text:
You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step.
{1}, {T}: Tap target artifact. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as this creature remains tapped.

name: Melt Terrain
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Melt Terrain deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

name: Ichor Rats
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

name: Darkslick Drake
oracle_text:
Flying

name: True Conviction
oracle_text: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

oracle_text:
This artifact enters with three charge counters on it.

name: Trigon of Corruption
oracle_text:
This artifact enters with three charge counters on it.

You have no maximum hand size.

Flying

name: Glint Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying

name: Lifesmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 3 life.

oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

name: Sunblast Angel
oracle_text:
Flying

name: Copper Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.

oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

flavor_text: The Mirran elders vanished with Memnarch, leaving behind a generation of wayward orphans.

oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life.

name: Oxidda Daredevil
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact: This creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Perilous Myr

name: Neurok Replica
oracle_text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice this creature: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Vault Skyward

name: Copperhorn Scout
oracle_text: Whenever this creature attacks, untap each other creature you control.

oracle_text:
This artifact enters with two charge counters on it.

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
When this creature enters, you may return target creature card with infect from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Flesh Allergy
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to the number of creatures that died this turn.

name: Vulshok Heartstoker
oracle_text: When this creature enters, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: He fashions stirring words with as much passion as a smith fashioning a warhammer.

name: Bleak Coven Vampires
oracle_text: Metalcraft — When this creature enters, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: As the shadow of the Mephidross spread over the Tangle, the vampires' territory expanded.

name: Strider Harness
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Each journey begins with a single step—and sometimes ends with that single step as well.

name: Horizon Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
When this artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Abuna Acolyte
oracle_text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.
flavor_text: "You can break nothing I cannot mend."

name: Furnace Celebration
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {2}. If you do, this enchantment deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Reduce. Reuse. Wreak havoc.

name: Indomitable Archangel
oracle_text:
Flying
Metalcraft — Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"Every sword drawn to defend is an angelic blade, guided to justice by an angelic hand."
—Auriok proverb

name: Grindclock
oracle_text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
{T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on this artifact.
flavor_text: Pray you never hear it chime.

name: Accorder's Shield
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: An Auriok shield is polished to a mirror finish even on the inside, enabling its bearer to watch foes ahead and behind.

name: Whitesun's Passage
oracle_text: You gain 5 life.
flavor_text: All over the Razor Fields, Whitesun is celebrated. Even the followers of the rebel Juryan, far from the Cave of Light, bow their heads in reverence.

name: Twisted Image
oracle_text:
Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form."
—Politus, vedalken emisar

name: Volition Reins
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When this Aura enters, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it.
You control enchanted permanent.
flavor_text: "Glorifying the will is a mistake. It is simply one more force to be mastered."

name: Plague Stinger
oracle_text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

name: Etched Champion
oracle_text: Metalcraft — This creature has protection from each color as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: Its predecessors were etched with the wisdom of ancients; its own etchings bear warnings of a future fraught with war.

name: Sylvok Lifestaff
flavor_text: The druid's lifestaff connects her to generations of bygone Sylvok.

name: Gold Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor_text: The myr are like razorgrass: numberless metal figures, reflecting each other's light.

name: Memoricide
oracle_text: Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
flavor_text: "You claim wisdom, yet I see nothing in here but tawdry wishes."

name: Blade-Tribe Berserkers
oracle_text: Metalcraft — When this creature enters, if you control three or more artifacts, this creature gets +3/+3 and gains haste until end of turn.

name: Kuldotha Forgemaster
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice three artifacts: Search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The goblins say it used to be larger, before it began to stoke the Great Furnace with pieces of itself.

name: Koth of the Hammer
oracle_text:
+1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
−2: Add {R} for each Mountain you control.
−5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have '{T}: This land deals 1 damage to any target.'"

name: Withstand Death
oracle_text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it still dies.)
flavor_text: On Mirrodin, every conflict ends in either death or darksteel.

name: Razorfield Thresher
flavor_text: DANGER! Keep appendages clear of front of machine. And rear of machine. And side of machine. And top of machine.

name: Myr Battlesphere
oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, this creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

name: Steel Hellkite
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by this creature this turn. Activate only once each turn.

name: Putrefax
oracle_text:
Trample, haste
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature.

name: Shape Anew
oracle_text: The controller of target artifact sacrifices it, then reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal an artifact card. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.

name: Corrupted Harvester
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate this creature.
flavor_text:
"Before the blessed assault begins, we must seek specimens that are well-adapted to our way of . . . life."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Tangle Angler
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{G}: Target creature blocks this creature this turn if able.
flavor_text: A plague on the curious.

name: Cystbearer
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: Phyrexia strives to simulate natural life, but it can't resist improving on the design.

name: Platinum Emperion
oracle_text: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)
flavor_text: It ignores such insignificant forces as time, entropy, and death.

name: Quicksilver Gargantuan
oracle_text: You may have this creature enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's 7/7.
flavor_text:
"You know you have achieved true power if the sea itself seeks to emulate your greatness."
—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

name: Painsmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.

name: Darksteel Axe
flavor_text: Heavier than it looks, tricky to wield, guaranteed to last.

name: Kemba's Skyguard
oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . 'strange.' Regent's orders."
—Ranya, skyhunter captain

name: Culling Dais
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card for each charge counter on this artifact.
flavor_text:
"Forswear the flesh and you will truly see."
—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

name: Livewire Lash
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell, this creature deals 2 damage to any target."

name: Carrion Call
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 green Phyrexian Insect creature tokens with infect. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: The natural order is out of order.

name: Chimeric Mass
oracle_text:
This artifact enters with X charge counters on it.
{1}: Until end of turn, this artifact becomes a Construct artifact creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of charge counters on it."

name: Skinrender
oracle_text: When this creature enters, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Trigon of Infestation
oracle_text:
This artifact enters with three charge counters on it.
{G}{G}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
{2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from this artifact: Create a 1/1 green Phyrexian Insect creature token with infect.

name: Bladed Pinions
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying and first strike.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: Lacking trained pterons, the Auriok had to rely on other measures to gain the upper hand in the skies.

name: Bonds of Quicksilver
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

name: Carnifex Demon
oracle_text:
Flying
This creature enters with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{B}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from this creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on each other creature.
flavor_text: Every contagion has a host.

name: Bloodshot Trainee
oracle_text: {T}: This creature deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate only if this creature's power is 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "Just think how strong I'll be if my arms don't tear off!"

name: Tunnel Ignus
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under their control this turn, this creature deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Fight mischief with mischief.

name: Fulgent Distraction
oracle_text: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.
flavor_text:
"Channeling the white-hot power of all five suns creates a pretty good diversion."
—Yavash of the Accorders

name: Ratchet Bomb
oracle_text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on this artifact.

name: Grand Architect
oracle_text:
Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1.
{U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn.
Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

name: Oxidda Scrapmelter
oracle_text: When this creature enters, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: It subsists on a diet rich in screaming metal and molten blood.

name: Genesis Wave
oracle_text: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{B}: Skithiryx gains haste until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

name: Scoria Elemental
flavor_text: A single molten cord links it to the subterranean furnaces, drawing heat and metal from beneath Kuldotha. Until that bond is cut, it carves a swath of raw destruction.

name: Relic Putrescence
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, its controller gets a poison counter.
flavor_text:
"Until we shed the curse of sentience, we must endure its grotesque handiwork."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Trinket Mage
oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Clone Shell
oracle_text:
Imprint — When this creature enters, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
When this creature dies, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Grasp of Darkness
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: On a world with five suns, night is compelled to become an aggressive force.

name: Chrome Steed
oracle_text: Metalcraft — This creature gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: According to Auriok myth, it collects scrap in order to reassemble its lost rider.

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

name: Tainted Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"Welcome to perfection."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Molder Beast
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, this creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A trail of scrap metal can lead it into an ambush. But take care not to overfeed it."
—Adaran, Tangle hunter

name: Rusted Relic
oracle_text: Metalcraft — This artifact is a 5/5 Golem artifact creature as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text:
"We consider rust a curable disease."
—Tarrin, Hammer-Tribe shaman

name: Thrummingbird
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature target player controls.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate twice. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

name: Slice in Twain
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The hypocrisy of these elves is thicker than steel—destroying 'unnatural metal' with their own enchanted swords."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Barrage Ogre
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: This creature deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was *thrown* at them.

name: Soul Parry
oracle_text: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Auriok Sunchaser
oracle_text: Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, this creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor_text:
"Grant me loft. Grant me light. Grant me the accuracy I need to kill all who threaten Bladehold."
—Prayer to the Whitesun

name: Moriok Reaver
flavor_text:
"The Moriok are fools. They try so hard to gain my favor. All I want is for them to die quickly, to join the ranks of the nim."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Darkslick Shores
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text: Where the Mephidross leaches into the Quicksilver Sea, the waves writhe with necrogen.

name: Myr Galvanizer
oracle_text:
Other Myr creatures you control get +1/+1.
{1}, {T}: Untap each other Myr you control.
flavor_text:
"We can't quite determine what they're doing, but they seem to be doing it quite well."
—Vedalken research notes

name: Tumble Magnet
oracle_text:
This artifact enters with three charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from this artifact: Tap target artifact or creature.
flavor_text: Magnetic devices that keep massive golems and structures standing can also be used for the opposite purpose.

name: Contagious Nim
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"This species has grown to be my preferred receptacle for our divine message."

name: Neurok Invisimancer
oracle_text:
This creature can't be blocked.
When this creature enters, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

oracle_text:
{G}: Regenerate another target Elf.
{2}{G}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: The infamous Ezuri commands the highest bounty the vedalken have ever placed upon an outlaw.

name: Carapace Forger
oracle_text: Metalcraft — This creature gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "Bows and whips cannot save us from these new horrors of the Mephidross."

name: Panic Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.
When this artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}. If you do, draw a card.

oracle_text:

Creatures you control have hexproof.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target creature. (The next time it would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

name: Golden Urn

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on this artifact.

Indestructible

oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Tel-Jilad Defiance
oracle_text:
Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The Viridian elves had purged their culture of the trolls' traitorous influence. In times of strife, however, the ancestral memories returned.

name: Ghalma's Warden
oracle_text: Metalcraft — This creature gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: A special unit guards the loxodon artificer known as Ghalma the Shaper. They are armed and armored in her finest works of silver and steel.

oracle_text:
Flying

Enchant creature

Flying

oracle_text: Metalcraft — This creature has flying as long as you control three or more artifacts.

Flying
